label: Drain Cleaning & Clog Removal
notes: Includes snaking, basic hydro-jetting; excludes camera inspection unless noted.

label: Toilet Repair & Unclogging
notes: Includes flapper/fill valve replacement, wax ring reseat, minor clog.

label: Leaky Pipe Repair
notes: Includes visible leak repair; excludes slab leak or water damage restoration.

label: Faucet/Fixture Repair or Replacement
notes: Standard swap or repair; high-end covers designer fixtures and hard access.

label: Water Heater Replacement
notes: Standard 40–50 gal tank unit; tankless installs trend toward high range.

label: Water Heater Repair
notes: Includes element/thermostat swap, burner service, or minor valve replacement.

label: Garbage Disposal Repair/Replacement
notes: Includes jam clearing, gasket swap, or full unit replacement.

label: Main Sewer Line Cleaning
notes: Includes auger or hydro-jetting; excludes pipe repair or trenching.

label: Sewer Line Repair or Replacement
notes: Includes excavation or trenchless where needed; varies by length/depth.

label: Slab Leak Detection & Repair
notes: Includes detection, jackhammer access, and patching; reroute costs vary.

label: Low Water Pressure Diagnosis & Repair
notes: Common fixes include aerator cleaning or PRV replacement; booster pump optional.

label: Sump Pump / Sewage Ejector Service
notes: Covers repairs or new install of sump/ejector pumps; includes haul-away.

label: Whole-House Repiping
notes: Typical PEX repipe of 2–3 bath homes; copper ups cost.

label: Gas Line Installation/Repair
notes: Includes new appliance hook-up or repair; trenching extra.

label: Backflow Preventer Testing & Repair
notes: Annual test and certification for residential irrigation systems.
